tool.name: Cut
tool.help:
.. class:: warningmark
**WARNING: This tool breaks column assignments.** To re-establish column assignments run the tools and click on "edit attributes" link in the latest history item (as shown at the end of this help screen).
-----
**Syntax**
Columns are specified as **c1**, **c2**, and so on. Column count begins with **1**
-----
**Example**
For the following query::
chr1 10 1000 gene1 0 + chr2 100 1500 gene2 0 +
running **cut** on columns "**c1,c4,c6**" will return::
chr1 gene1 + chr2 gene2 +
-----
Output of this tool looses column assignments. To make new assignments "edit attributes" of the history item generated by this tool as shown here:
.. image:: ../static/images/SetAttr.png
